channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver BW (BEx Analyzer)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver BW (BEx Analyzer)

item.title: CVE-2024-41729|2024-09-10T02:33:32.937Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20bw%20%28bex%20analyzer%29
item.description: Due to missing authorization checks, SAP BEx Analyzer allows an authenticated attacker to access information over the network which is otherwise restricted. On successful exploitation the attacker can enumerate information causing a limited impact on confidentiality of the application.
